contents: 2. fol. 9b-10a: Jawāb al-Shaykh al-Raʼīs raḥmat Allāh ʻalayhi.
3. fol. 10b-11b: Risālah fī baqāʼ al-nafs al-insānīyah baʻda bawār al-badan.
5. fol. 14b: Risālah fī ithbāt al-jawhar al-mufāraq.
8. fol. 76b-81a: [Treatise] / Abū Saʻīd ibn Abī al-Khayr.
10. fol. 88b-92a: Risālah fī ʻadam al-khawf min al-mawt.
13. fol. 102b-104b: Īḍāḥ al-barāhīn min masāʼil ʻawīṣah.
15. fol. 108b-128b: Maqālah fī al-jamʻ bayna raʼyay Aflāṭūn wa-Arisṭū.
25. fol. 303b-333a: al-Risālah al-jadīdah fī ithbāt al-wājib.
28. fol. 370b-371b: Risālah fī ithbāt al-jawhar al-mufāraq.
extent: 371 leaves : paper ; 170 x 109 mm. bound to 171 x 110 mm.
subject: Muḥammad, Prophet, -632—Isrāʼ and Miʻrāj—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
